price: আৰু শিঙাত ফুঁ দিয়া হ’ব। এইটোৱে হৈছে প্ৰতিশ্ৰুত দিন।
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
